Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.Calculator

  • public class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Calculator calculates everything needed for the 3D/2D graphics.
    Author:
    John Konrad Ferraz Salomon - John´s Project

      • get2D

        public Position get2D(Position position)
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the point to be rotated.
        Returns:
        the 2D Position of the 3D Position, with z set to 0 and x and y as the 2d coordinates to draw on the ScenePaint.

      • get2D

        public Position get2D(Position position,
                      Position basePosition)
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the point to be rotated.
        basePosition - the position to use as base for the rotation of the point's position.
        Returns:
        the 2D Position of the 3D Position based on the basePosition, with z set to 0 and x and y as the 2d coordinates to draw on the ScenePaint.
